metadata.description: Les "Survivorman" Stroud has accepted the challenge of tracking down a vital early American artifact known as "The Horn of Providence."  He will have to use his survival instincts and trademark problem solving skills as he battles the Horn's captor: Oswald Wood.  Les, his son Logan, and trust sidekick CroMagnon will work as a team to bring the horn back to its rightful owner.
metadata.name: Les Stroud's: Survivorman: The Horn of Providence
